dialog-baker-glitched.name: %Baker%
messages:
Qacwk, A kmvvwfdq usf'l kww kljsayzl. A
ymwkk A kzgmdv uml tsuc gf lzw usxxawfw

dialog-strong_bad-glitched.name: %Strong Bad%
messages: fhqwhgadshgnsdhjsdbkhsdabkfabkveybvf

dialog-bobg-glitched.name: %Guardian Bob%
messages: Gung'f n onq fvta.

dialog-bobrock-glitched.name: %Bob Austin%
messages: Sqd'j meha byau jxyi.

dialog-baker-start.name: %Baker%
messages:
Hey, I'm pretty swamped. Can you run an
errand for me?

dialog-baker-start.name: %PLAYER%
messages: What do you need?

dialog-baker-start.name: %Baker%
messages:
The Bobs-Only Club placed a huge order for
B-shaped donuts, due tonight, but I can't
get anyone to confirm the order.
They haven't paid yet, either.

I went over there this morning, but they
wouldn't let me in! And Bob wouldn't tell
me anything!

I just want to know whether or not they
still want these donuts. I'm running out
of time to get everything ready by
tonight.

Can you find out for me? Get some answers
from Bob? Any Bob?

dialog-baker-start.name: %PLAYER%
messages:
Sure, I can swing past that way. See what
I can find out.

dialog-baker-start.name: %Baker%
messages: Thanks.
Oh, and happy birthday.

dialog-baker-start-s.name: %Baker%
messages: Hear anything from the Bobs-Only Club yet?

dialog-bobrock-gottago.name: %Bob Austin%
messages: Goin' back to work.

dialog-bobrock-start1.name: %Bob Austin%
messages: Name's Bob.
Stone Cold %Bob Austin%.
Right, what's yours, then?

dialog-bobrock-start1.name: %PLAYER%
messages:
You don't know who I am? We've both lived
here for years!

dialog-bobrock-start1.name: %Bob Austin%
messages:
Don't know nobody. All I know is, gotta
keep everyone out.
You know, unless their name is Bob.

dialog-bobrock-start1.name: %PLAYER%
messages: Bob?

dialog-bobrock-start1.name: %Bob Austin%
messages:
Bob. Camel case.
Nice and plain.
Traditional.

'Cause this club is Bobs-only. You know,
the Bobs-Only Club.

dialog-bobrock-start1.name: %PLAYER%
messages: Why is it Bobs only?

dialog-bobrock-start1.name: %Bob Austin%
messages:
Why?
Why is it Bobs only?

Why, it wouldn't be the Bobs-Only Club if
I just let anyone in!

dialog-bobrock-start2.name: %PLAYER%
messages:
Well, the baker needs to know whether the
club still needs a bunch of B-shaped
donuts for tonight.

Do you know if the Bobs still want them?
There's gonna be a party tonight, right?

dialog-bobrock-start2.name: %Bob Austin%
messages: That's for Bobs to know.
Only Bobs.
Bobs only.

dialog-bobrock-start2.name: %PLAYER%
messages: I think the baker needs to know, too!

dialog-bobrock-start2.name: %Bob Austin%
messages:
Well, if his name was Bob, I would've let
him in!

dialog-bobrock-bounce.name: %Bob Austin%
messages: So, what's your name then?

dialog-bobrock-nobob.name: %PLAYER%
messages:
Um....
it's %PLAYER%.

dialog-bobrock-nobob.name: %Bob Austin%
messages:
Sorry, can't unlock the door for ya.
Bobs only.

dialog-bobrock-yesbob1.name: %PLAYER%
messages: Why, what luck! My name happens to be Bob!

dialog-bobrock-yesbob1.name: %Bob Austin%
messages: Nice. Great name. I'll open it on up.

dialog-bobrock-yesbob2.name: %Bob Austin%
messages: Head inside quick, now.

dialog-bobsclub1.name: %Guardian Bob%
messages:
Oh, hello. You must be here for the annual
Bobs-Only Party, right?

dialog-bobsclub2.name: %Guardian Bob%
messages:
Well, I hate to tell you this, but it's
canceled this year.

dialog-bobsclub2.name: %PLAYER%
messages: What? Canceled?

dialog-bobsclub2.name: %Guardian Bob%
messages: Yeah. This time, for real.

I mean, every year they SAY its canceled,
but this time it's actually genuinely
canceled.

dialog-bobsclub2.name: %Strong Bad%
messages: Wait, canceled?!

dialog-bobsclub3.name: %Strong Bad%
messages: But what about all the ladies?!

dialog-bobsclub3.name: %PLAYER%
messages:
Ladies? I'm pretty sure Bob is a masculine
name, traditionally.

dialog-bobsclub3.name: %Strong Bad%
messages: Nuh-uh!
What about Bob... rietta? Bob... velyn?
Barbara? I mean, Bob-ara?

They're still gonna come to the party,
aren't they?

dialog-bobsclub3.name: %PLAYER%
messages: Sorry, dude! Not if the party's canceled.
...Also not if none of them are named Bob.

dialog-bobsclub3.name: %Strong Bad%
messages:
Sure, they'll come! I just gotta wait a
little more!

dialog-bobsclub3.name: %PLAYER%
messages: I think you came to the wrong party.

dialog-bobsclub4.name: %Guardian Bob%
messages:
Well, this place should be full of Bobs...
next year.

dialog-bobsclub5.name: %Strong Bad%
messages:
Bob-alina!
Bob-cine!
Bob-quelyn!
Come baaaack!

dialog-bobsclub6.name: %PLAYER%
messages:
So I guess I can tell the baker to cancel
the donut order then, huh?

dialog-bobsclub6.name: %Guardian Bob%
messages: Guess so. Sorry about this.

dialog-bobsclub-bob.name: %Guardian Bob%
messages:
They could've told me the party was
actually canceled before I made the trip
out here.

*sigh*
Oh, well.

dialog-bobsclub-bob-where.name: %Guardian Bob%
messages:
Wait. Weren't there two Bob golems last
year?

dialog-bobsclub-strongbob.name: %Strong Bad%
messages: Why, hello there, fellow Bob!

dialog-bobsclub-strongbob.name: %PLAYER%
messages: Your name is Bob?

dialog-bobsclub-strongbob.name: %Strong Bad%
messages: Why, it sure is!

dialog-bobsclub-strongbob.name: %PLAYER%
messages:
You look an awful lot like Strong Bad to
me.

dialog-bobsclub-strongbob.name: %Strong Bad%
messages:
Wha-what? STRONG BAD? Never heard of him.
Though he sounds like quite the rugged
and handsome gentleman.

The name's Strong BOB! Just lookee here
at my fake--I mean real--ID!

dialog-bobsclub-strongbob.name: %PLAYER%
messages:
(This ID clearly belongs to "Bob Newhart,"
but the word Newhart is crossed out.)

(I guess Bob out front doesn't have very
good eyes.)

dialog-bobsclub-strongbob-s.name: %Strong Bad%
messages:
Yessirree! Strong Bob's the name, and
partyin's the game!

dialog-balloonbox.name: %PLAYER%
messages: Just a box of pre-inflated balloons.

How many balloos does a party need,
anyway?

dialog-bobrock-bounce-rehash.name: %PLAYER%
messages:
We've been through all this before, you
know.

dialog-bobrock-bounce-rehash.name: %Bob Austin%
messages:
Doesn't matter. It's just the rules. Bobs
only.

dialog-bobrock-nobob-rehash.name: %PLAYER%
messages: Fine. I guess I'm not getting in, then.

dialog-bobrock-nobob-rehash.name: %Bob Austin%
messages: Damn straight.

dialog-bobrock-yesbob-rehash.name: %PLAYER%
messages: Well, my name is Bob! Happy?

dialog-bobrock-yesbob-rehash.name: %Bob Austin%
messages: Cool. Great name.

dialog-baker-end.name: %Baker%
messages:
Canceled? They're really sure it's all
canceled? For real?

dialog-baker-end.name: %PLAYER%
messages: That's what Bob said.

dialog-baker-end.name: %Baker%
messages: Bob? Stone Cold Bob Austin?

dialog-baker-end.name: %PLAYER%
messages: Uh... well, it was someone named Bob.

dialog-baker-end.name: %Baker%
messages:
Great. Just great. Just as I was putting
everything in the oven. Not gonna pay me
either, are they?

Well, thanks for finding out for me.
Now I need to find a way to move four
dozen B-shaped donuts.

dialog-baker-end-s.name: %Baker%
messages:
Say, you wouldn't want a B-shaped donut,
would you? On the house.

dialog-bobmoss-glitched1.name: %Bob Moss%
messages:
Well that's no good. I should really try
to relax. Loosen up a bit....

dialog-bobmoss-glitched2.name: %Bob Moss%
messages: All better. Now isn't that nice?

dialog-bobmoss-start1.name: %Bob Moss%
messages: Oh, hello, there.

dialog-bobmoss-start2.name: %Bob Moss%
messages:
I was just admiring the forest, with its
happy little trees....

I've made so many squirrel friends,
and....

dialog-bobmoss-start3.name: %Bob Moss%
messages: Oh!

I didn't realize how late it was getting.
I think I might be late for work.

I'd better head out. Hope to see you
again.

dialog-bobmoss-start-s.name: %Bob Moss%
messages:
Sorry, I can't serve anyone until the
party starts.

Help yourself to a Cactus Cooler, though.
Plenty in the fridge.

dialog-fridge.name: %PLAYER%
messages:
(Wow. There's literally nothing but cans
of Cactus Cooler in here.)

dialog-bobwall.name: %PLAYER%
messages: Wall of Bobs: famous Bobs.

Robert Parr, superhero.
Bob Kelso, physician.
SpongeBob, fry cook.
There sure are a lot of Bobs in the world.

dialog-debug-bob-q.name: %SELF%
messages: How to Bob?

dialog-debug-bob-skipconvo.name: %SELF%
messages: Bob Austin has been spoken to.

dialog-debug-bob-also-setnamebob.name: %SELF%
messages:
Bob Austin has been spoken to, and your
name is Bob.

dialog-debug-bob-teleport.name: %SELF%
messages: Teleportation in progress.
